001package org.biopax.paxtools.impl.level3;
002
003import org.biopax.paxtools.model.level3.*;
004import org.biopax.paxtools.util.IllegalBioPAXArgumentException;
005
006
007public class SmallMoleculeImpl extends SimplePhysicalEntityImpl
008                implements SmallMolecule
009{
010        public SmallMoleculeImpl() {
011        }
012        
013        @Override
014        public Class<? extends PhysicalEntity> getModelInterface() {
015                return SmallMolecule.class;
016        }
017        
018        @Override
019        public void addFeature(EntityFeature feature) {
020                if(feature==null || feature instanceof BindingFeature)
021                        super.addFeature(feature);
022                else 
023                        throw new IllegalBioPAXArgumentException(
024                                        "Range violation: SmallMolecule.feature can have only BindingFeature"); 
025        }
026        
027        @Override
028        public void addNotFeature(EntityFeature feature) {
029                if(feature==null || feature instanceof BindingFeature)
030                        super.addNotFeature(feature);
031                else 
032                        throw new IllegalBioPAXArgumentException(
033                                        "Range violation: SmallMolecule.notFeature can have only BindingFeature");      
034        }
035
036
037        @Override
038        public void setEntityReference(EntityReference entityReference) {
039                if(entityReference instanceof SmallMoleculeReference || entityReference == null)
040                        super.setEntityReference(entityReference);
041                else
042                        throw new IllegalBioPAXArgumentException("setEntityReference failed: "
043                                        + entityReference.getUri() + " is not a SmallMoleculeReference.");
044        }
045}
